features.title: Effortless setup
features.description: Choose the level of detail you want in each portfolio – from opening balances to complete trading histories – all imported it in just a few clicks.

features.title: Automatic updates
features.description: Sit back and watch as share prices, currency effects and corporate actions such as dividends and share splits are automatically incorporated.

features.title: Simple sharing
features.description: Grant access to staff and clients according to the level of access they require: read, read/write, or admin.

features.title: Comprehensive tax reporting
features.description: Get everything you need for balance sheet preparation plus comprehensive tax-time reports including taxable income, historical cost, and more.

features.title: Seamless Xero integration
features.description: Synchronise share purchases, sales, and dividends to leading online accounting system Xero for easy bank statement reconciliation. Plus track cash balances for complete financial positions.

features.title: Powerful performance data
features.description: Analyse a portfolio or individual holding’s true returns – including brokerage, currency effects and dividends. Plus run easy-to-read diversity, asset allocation and contribution analysis reports.

features.title: Mobile app
features.description: Go mobile with a handy app designed for iPhone & Android phones, plus the full version of Sharesight works great on tablets as well as computers.

features.title: Branded reports
features.description: Apply your logo to marketing flyers and PDF reports so they’re personalised with your company brand when you download and share them with clients.

features.title: Helpful support
features.description: Reach out to your dedicated account manager whenever you need assistance, plus leverage online tutorials and an active community forum.
